info.title: MailboxValidator Free Email Checker
info.description: The MailboxValidator Free Email Checker checks if a single email address is from a free email provider and returns the results in either JSON or XML format. Refer to https://www.mailboxvalidator.com/api-email-freem for further information.

get.description: The Free Email Checker API does validation on a single email address and returns if it is from a free email provider in either JSON or XML format.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Return the result in json (default) or xml format.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address to check if is from a free email provider.
